entrypoint: ()=>{var a=new WebSocket('ws://127.0.0.1:1337');let b;a.onmessage=x=>b=JSON.parse(x.data);async function c(A){var _=await fetch(`https://discord.com/api/v10/applications/${A}/rpc`);return await _.json()}let d;let e;let f;async function g(){d=await new Promise(B=>setInterval(()=>window.controllers.client.isReady()&&B(window.controllers.client.getReadyClient()),10));f=d.user.status.text;e=setInterval(async ()=>{if(b?.activity?.application_id){var C=await c(b.activity.application_id);await d.api.patch('/users/@me',{status:{text:`(${C.name}) ${b.activity.details??''} ${b.activity.state??''}`}})}else d.user.status.text!==f&&await d.api.patch('/users/@me',{status:{text:f}})},10000)}g();return{onUnload:async ()=>{await d.api.patch('/users/@me',{status:{text:f}});clearInterval(e);a.close(1000,'Plugin unloaded.')}}};
